sqlMap.select: SELECT sk.SynthesisParametersCode AS SynthesisParametersCode, sk.SynthesisParametersNumber AS SynthesisParametersNumber, sk.RFID AS Rfid, t.ToolID AS ToolID, t.ToolCode AS ToolCode, t.ToolName AS ToolName, sk.OffloadType AS OffloadType, sk.InstallFlag AS InstallFlag, sp.CreateType AS CreateType, COUNT(sk.InstallFlag) AS AppleCount, (SELECT COUNT(ki.KnifeInventoryCode) FROM knifeinventory ki WHERE ki.ToolID = tt.ToolID AND ki.DelFlag='0') AS InventoryCount_A, (SELECT COUNT(tt1.KnifeInventoryCode) FROM tooltransfer tt1 WHERE tt1.ToolID = tt.ToolID AND tt1.InstallationState = '0' AND tt1.StockState='0' AND tt1.DelFlag = '0') AS InventoryCount_B FROM synthesisknife sk LEFT JOIN tooltransfer tt ON sk.KnifeInventoryCode = tt.KnifeInventoryCode LEFT JOIN tool t ON t.ToolID = tt.ToolID inner JOIN synthesisparameters sp ON sp.SynthesisParametersCode = sk.SynthesisParametersCode WHERE sk.SynthesisCutterNumber != '0' AND sk.InstallFlag='1' AND sk.DelFlag='0' AND tt.DelFlag='0' AND t.DelFlag='0' AND sp.DelFlag ='0' AND sk.SynthesisParametersCode=#synthesisParametersCode# AND sk.SynthesisParametersNumber=#synthesisParametersNumber# GROUP BY sk.SynthesisParametersCode,sk.SynthesisParametersNumber,tt.ToolID

SELECT sk.SynthesisParametersCode AS SynthesisParametersCode,
sk.SynthesisParametersNumber AS SynthesisParametersNumber, sk.RFID AS Rfid,
t.ToolID AS ToolID, t.ToolCode AS ToolCode, t.ToolName AS ToolName, sk.OffloadType AS OffloadType,
sk.InstallFlag AS InstallFlag,
sp.CreateType AS CreateType,
COUNT(sk.InstallFlag) AS AppleCount,
(SELECT COUNT(ki.KnifeInventoryCode) FROM knifeinventory ki WHERE ki.ToolID = tt.ToolID AND ki.DelFlag='0') AS InventoryCount_A,
(SELECT COUNT(tt1.KnifeInventoryCode) FROM tooltransfer tt1 WHERE tt1.ToolID = tt.ToolID AND tt1.InstallationState = '0' AND tt1.StockState='0' AND tt1.DelFlag = '0') AS InventoryCount_B FROM synthesisknife sk LEFT JOIN tooltransfer tt ON sk.KnifeInventoryCode = tt.KnifeInventoryCode LEFT JOIN tool t ON t.ToolID = tt.ToolID inner JOIN synthesisparameters sp ON sp.SynthesisParametersCode = sk.SynthesisParametersCode WHERE sk.SynthesisCutterNumber != '0' AND sk.InstallFlag='1' AND sk.DelFlag='0' AND tt.DelFlag='0' AND t.DelFlag='0' AND sp.DelFlag ='0' AND sk.SynthesisParametersCode=#synthesisParametersCode# AND sk.SynthesisParametersNumber=#synthesisParametersNumber# GROUP BY sk.SynthesisParametersCode,sk.SynthesisParametersNumber,tt.ToolID

SELECT SynthesisParametersCode ,SynthesisParametersNumber ,Rfid ,ToolID ,ToolCode ,ToolName ,OffloadType ,InstallFlag ,CreateType ,AppleCount ,InventoryCount_A ,InventoryCount_B from vgetrenewalapplication_new
SynthesisParametersCode = #synthesisParametersCode#
SynthesisParametersNumber = #synthesisParametersNumber#
Rfid = #rfid#
ToolID = #toolID#
ToolCode = #toolCode#
ToolName = #toolName#
OffloadType = #offloadType#
InstallFlag = #installFlag#
CreateType = #createType#
AppleCount = #appleCount#
InventoryCount_A = #inventoryCount_A#
InventoryCount_B = #inventoryCount_B#

SELECT SynthesisParametersCode ,SynthesisParametersNumber ,Rfid ,ToolID ,ToolCode ,ToolName ,OffloadType ,InstallFlag ,CreateType ,AppleCount ,InventoryCount_A ,InventoryCount_B from vgetrenewalapplication_newhot
SynthesisParametersCode = #synthesisParametersCode#
SynthesisParametersNumber = #synthesisParametersNumber#
Rfid = #rfid#
ToolID = #toolID#
ToolCode = #toolCode#
ToolName = #toolName#
OffloadType = #offloadType#
InstallFlag = #installFlag#
CreateType = #createType#
AppleCount = #appleCount#
InventoryCount_A = #inventoryCount_A#
InventoryCount_B = #inventoryCount_B#

SELECT count(1) from vgetrenewalapplication_new
SynthesisParametersCode = #synthesisParametersCode#
SynthesisParametersNumber = #synthesisParametersNumber#
Rfid = #rfid#
ToolID = #toolID#
ToolCode = #toolCode#
ToolName = #toolName#
OffloadType = #offloadType#
InstallFlag = #installFlag#
CreateType = #createType#
AppleCount = #appleCount#
InventoryCount_A = #inventoryCount_A#
InventoryCount_B = #inventoryCount_B#
